DOC.brief_summary: This study do evaluate safety , tolerability satisfactory relief dyspepsia symptom female exclude predominant stomach pain . Tegaserod evaluate 6mg twice daily placebo .
DOC.brief_title: Assessment Efficacy Safety Tegaserod Treatment Placebo Women With Dyspepsia
DOC.criteria: Female , 18 year older Selfreported presence persistent recurrent adverse digestive symptom consistent dyspepsia least 12 week , necessarily consecutive , previous 12 month . Abnormal upper GI endoscopy finding esophageal , gastric erosion ulcer and/or duodenal ulcers/erosions . Any following symptom : heartburn , epigastric pain , nausea vomiting .
